testcase.name: Verify current page for electric
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to UKP landing page with "https://qa.ukpower.co.uk/".......passed When I enter postcode "ha85hf"..............................................passed And I click Compare now button..............................................passed And I select Do you use gas option "No".....................................passed And I select Economy seven option "No"......................................passed And I select Energy Usage Option "No".......................................passed And I select size of property "1Bedroom"....................................passed And I click See Result button...............................................passed Then I close the browser....................................................passed
